serverSide

Class GeneralRepositoryAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • serverSide.GeneralRepositoryAdapter

  • public class GeneralRepositoryAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    Definition of the interface of the General Repository shared region on this solution of the Restaurant's Problem, implementing the client-server model of type 2 (server replication) with static launching of the entities envolved.

      Instantiation of the GeneralRepository interface.
